#Text=Wait to Bring Home a New Pet
#Text=A pet can mean so much to a family .
#Text=Whether you are going to be getting a bird , fish , dog , cat , unicorn , or whatever it is , you can love them so much !
#Text=Waiting to bring them home can be excruciating , nobody wants to wait and leave their new best friend in a shelter , or wherever they are when they could be home and bonding with you .
#Text=Sometimes you just have to wait though , this article should help with that .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Make sure everything is prepared for your pet .
#Text=You want everything to be perfect for when they come into their new home , so while you 're waiting , optimize your environment , and get all the stuff they 'll need .
#Text=A small dog might need you to fill any holes under the fence so they ca n't escape , come up with where you 're going to put dishes , cages , beds .
#Text=so on .
#Text=You do n't want there to be a little confusion and problems when you bring them home , so make sure everything is ready !
#Text=Bake some treats for them !
#Text=Everyone loves some delicious home-made food , why would n't your pet ?
#Text=A new bird might love some pudding for birds , or maybe your dog would enjoy some fresh baked dog bones .
#Text=Google some recipes for whatever animal you are getting , and you 'll probably find something you 'll love to make , and your new friend will love to eat !
#Text=Draw pictures , write , or create something depicting them .
#Text=Whatever you like creating , be it traditional art or Minecraft building , you could try putting together something like your pet , or are excited to do with your pet .
#Text=Do n't worry about being accurate , just enjoy yourself !
#Text=Do homework , or something else you have due soon .
#Text=Rather than just waiting , finish up one of your projects you have due .
#Text=Its important in your life to get this done , you 'll also have more spare time for when the pet does come home !
#Text=Play and video game , or watch YouTube .
#Text=Near everyone is entertained this way .
#Text=If you watch a video maybe one about the type of pet you 're bringing home .
#Text=Look at images of the pet .
#Text=Do a Google image search of maybe ' cool fish tanks ' or ' cat houses ' maybe even ' clothes for turtles '
#Text=you 'd be surprised what comes up .
#Text=Maybe what you find will help inspire something you can do for your animal .
#Text=Adding how to into the search will help you find a variety of cool things to do .
#Text=Keep in mind : they 'll be home soon !
#Text=Just keep waiting and being patient .
#Text=It will be incredible once they finally are with you .
#Text=Good luck , and have fun !
#Text=Tips
#Text=When waiting to bring home a new pet , our minds are focused on them .
#Text=So whatever you 're doing , it 's best if it relates to the pet as well , because whatever you do , your mind will probably be preoccupied by them anyway .
